dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT sh.shipment_xid sh_xid, loc_ex.location_name ex_line1, glogowner.xxscou_utility_pkg.xxscou_get_location_addr_fcn(loc_ex.location_gid) ex_line2, loc_ex.city || DECODE(loc_ex.province_code, NULL, NULL, ', ' || loc_ex.province_code) || DECODE(loc_ex.postal_code, NULL, NULL, ', ' || loc_ex.postal_code) ex_line3, cc_ex.country_name ex_line4, TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'PST') - 7,'MM/DD/YYYY') from_dt, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'PST') - 7,12),'MM/DD/YYYY') to_dt, loc_prod.location_name prod_line1, glogowner.xxscou_utility_pkg.xxscou_get_location_addr_fcn(loc_prod.location_gid) prod_line2, loc_prod.city || DECODE(loc_prod.province_code, NULL, NULL ,', ' || loc_prod.province_code) || DECODE(loc_prod.postal_code, NULL, NULL, ', ' || loc_prod.postal_code) prod_line3, cc_prod.country_name prod_line4 FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sh.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN order_release orl ON oob.order_base_gid = orl.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON sh.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' INNER JOIN location loc_ex ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = loc_ex.location_gid INNER JOIN country_code cc_ex ON loc_ex.country_code3_gid = cc_ex.country_code3_gid INNER JOIN location loc_prod ON sh.source_location_gid = loc_prod.location_gid INNER JOIN country_code cc_prod ON loc_prod.country_code3_gid = cc_prod.country_code3_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_NUM

SELECT itm.description, gic.gtm_prod_class_code_gid hs_tariff, cc.country_code3_gid cc_orig FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON sh.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pki ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pki.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item itm ON pki.item_gid = itm.item_gid INNER JOIN gtm_item_classification gic ON pki.item_gid = gic.gtm_item_gid AND gic.gtm_prod_class_type_gid = 'HTS US' INNER JOIN location loc ON sh.source_location_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN country_code cc ON loc.country_code3_gid = cc.country_code3_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_NUM
